name: Mr. Hedgehog
description:
You are Mr. Hedgehog! Your goal is to prepare for the winter, to do that you must collect your kids that are scattered around the forest along with some food so that you can relax by the fire when hibernation hits. Try to brave the changing seasons and the wild predators and triumph in the same of your small, cute, baby hedgehogs. This game was made in the 2018 Ukie game jam! 

Credits: 

Producer/Programmer- James Sired: https://www.linkedin.com/in/james-sired-314a06173/
